overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: Publishing your extension to the marketplace involves signing it with your private key, packaging it into a .xt file, and submitting it for review.

signing.title: Cryptographic Signing
signing.intro: Every extension must be signed with an Ed25519 keypair. This ensures users can verify the extension came from you and hasn't been tampered with.
signing.keygenDesc: If you haven't already, generate a keypair:

warning.title: Critical
warning.description: Never commit private.key to version control. If you lose this key, you cannot update your extension and must publish as a new extension with a different identity.

about.title: About Ed25519
about.publicKey: Public key: 64 hex characters (included in manifest)

submitting.title: Submitting to Marketplace
submitting.intro: Follow these steps to submit your extension:

step1.title: Create a Developer Account
step1.description: Sign up or log in at haex.space/developers

step2.title: Prepare Your Listing
step2.description: Write a compelling description, create screenshots, and prepare your icon (256x256 PNG recommended)

step3.title: Upload Extension
step3.description: Upload your .xt file and fill in the listing details

step4.title: Submit for Review
step4.description: Submit and wait for our security review (typically 2-3 business days)

checklist.title: Pre-submission Checklist
checklist.item1: Extension tested on all target platforms
checklist.item2: All permissions are necessary and documented
checklist.item3: Icon and screenshots are high quality
checklist.item5: Private key is backed up securely

updates.title: Publishing Updates
updates.intro: To update your extension, increment the version in manifest.json and sign again:
updates.warning: You must use the same private key that signed the original extension. Users will only receive updates from the same publisher.
